text: Count Duckula is a British animated comedy horror television series created by the British studio Cosgrove Hall Films and produced by Thames Television as a spin off sequel DangerMouse a series which the character. It was cast by Brian Trueman, David Jason, Jimmy Hibbert, Barry Clayton, Jack May, Ruby Wax and Susan Sheridan.
